mapper.select: SELECT IFNULL(MAX(ID) + 1, 1) FROM USER_STICKY WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}
SELECT ID, USER_ID, POSITION_TOP, POSITION_LEFT, CONTENT FROM USER_STICKY WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USER_STICKY ( ID, USER_ID, POSITION_TOP, POSITION_LEFT, CONTENT ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{userId}, #{positionTop}, #{positionLeft}, #{content} )
mapper.update: UPDATE USER_STICKY SET USER_ID = #{userId}, POSITION_TOP = #{positionTop}, POSITION_LEFT = #{positionLeft}, CONTENT = #{content} WHERE ID = #{id}
